articles.author: Dan Colasimone
articles.title: Germany's crushing win over Portugal at Euro 2020 was entertaining and enlightening - ABC News
articles.description: After a quiet couple of days at the European Championships, this felt like the return of big-time football, with some big hints at how the tournament might pan out, writes Dan Colasimone.
articles.content:
The group of death came alive at Euro 2020 overnight, with France held to a shock 1-1 draw against Hungary, and Germany crushing Portugal 4-2.
After a quiet couple of days at the European Championsh… [+3931 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Motorists could be in line for cheaper premiums after EU car insurance probe - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The European Commission found Insurance Ireland breached EU antitrust rules, effectively restricting competition in the industry.
articles.content:
Motorists could be in line for cheaper premiums and refunds if the insurance industry is found to have blocked new players from entering the market.
